name: Yamu!!
greetingText: I can't get over how amazing your smile is..
wishText: May our journey unfold  like the most beautiful code ever written! ❤️
textInChatBox: HAPPY BIRTHDAY to u, who isn't just special but truly unforgettable..
text2: I thought about sending just a simple message.
outroText: You make every moment special, just like you are....
replayText: Click here to feel my birthday wish again.
